text: The Manchester British-Americans were an American basketball team based in Manchester, Connecticut that was a member of the American Basketball League. Famed boxer Ruby Goldstein once played for the team. He is one of the oldest people to have ever played in the ABL( American Basketball League) at 43 years 9 months and two days. ==Year-by-year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !League !Reg.
